name: Of Light and Darkness
description: Of Light and Darkness is the creation of an award-winning team that includes game designer Cliff Johnson of Fool's Errand™, storyteller David Riordan of Voyeur™, writer Ken Melville of Sewer Shark™.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 Storage: 1 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
